page.title: 07St. Mary'S C.E. School.
page.content: {St.Mary's school,Shawbury}is a{Primary school for children aged{5 to 11.There are{68 girls}and{84 boys.}It is a {modern building}with many windows and a{flat roof. Inside there are{6 classrooms,}a hall,a general purposes room, a staff room,an office and a kitchen. There are 6 teachers,a headmistress, a secretary and two ancillary helpers. There is a cook,two kitchen assistants and four dinner ladies who supervise the children. At lunch time the children eat sandwiches or a school dinner. In the classrooms we sit in groups and most of our work is linked with our topic.This term our topic has been {The Domesday Project. Outside there is a playground and a playing field marked out for sports like football,netball and rounders.
